markdown: ###### Minor Positive reputation with Neketaka;[Tears of Saint Makawo](/tearsOfSaintMakawo/) | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Bounty - Nomu the Marauder | conc = | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_Sea_Troll | guid = 81312f76-ad17-47f3-9fb2-3344b4347820 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis A sea troll called Tāhae has made a name for himself raiding fishing villages south of Neketaka. There's a bounty reward for anyone who brings in Tāhae's head. This is the last of the bounties and Abocco will recommend that you talk to Okauro in Sacred Stair for more work. ## Walkthrough * Obtain the quest by speaking to [Abocco](/abocco/) at [The Wild Mare](/theWildMare/). * Located south of [Neketaka](/neketaka/), at 26° 22' S, 47° 7' E. Drops [Tears of Saint Makawo](/tearsOfSaintMakawo/). ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_Sea_Troll.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Tāhae''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | A sea troll called Tāhae has made a name for himself raiding fishing villages south of Neketaka. There's a bounty reward for anyone who brings in Tāhae's head. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Tāhae.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Tāhae was last seen raiding coastal villages south of Neketaka. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Abocco.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Now that Tāhae has been dealt with, Abocco at the Wild Mare in Queen's Berth will gladly pay for evidence of his demise. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I slew Tāhae and claimed the bounty reward from Abocco. |}
